==== Definition of psychotherapy ====
Any use of psychological means to treat a psychiatric disorder or for [[Know the definition of psychotherapy OIC-073-01-A#%20msocom%201|[FB1]]] any other non-psychiatric problem causing psychological suffering or distress
----[[Know the definition of the term psychotherapy OIC-073-01-A#%20msoanchor%201|[FB1]]]<nowiki/>for too much?

question.question: What is the primary goal of psychotherapy?
question.option_a: To prescribe medication to manage symptoms
question.option_b: To use psychological methods to treat psychiatric disorders or psychological distress
question.option_c: To perform surgical procedures to alter brain chemistry
question.option_d: To provide nutritional advice to improve mental health
